description: This file implements the 'Monitor' class for managing plugin health and statistics, including methods for registration, API endpoints, and event signaling within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace.

classes.name: Monitor
classes.description: A class responsible for monitoring plugin status, handling API requests such as restart limits and stats reset, and emitting events.

methods.name: void RegisterAll()
methods.description: Registers API endpoints and properties related to plugin monitoring.

methods.name: void UnregisterAll()
methods.description: Unregisters all monitoring-related API endpoints and properties.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_restartlimits(const RestartlimitsParamsData & params)
methods.description: Sets new restart limits for a plugin identified by callsign.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_resetstats(const ResetstatsParamsData & params,InfoInfo & response)
methods.description: Resets statistics for a plugin and populates the response with current info.

methods.name: uint32_t get_status(const string & index,Core::JSON::ArrayType<InfoInfo> & response) const
methods.description: Retrieves current status (memory and process statistics) for a specific plugin or all plugins.

methods.name: void event_action(const string & callsign,const string & action,const string & reason)
methods.description: Emits an event signaling an action taken by the monitor on a plugin.

ctags.name: endpoint_resetstats
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t Monitor::endpoint_resetstats(const ResetstatsParamsData& params, InfoInfo& response/

ctags.name: event_action
ctags.pattern: /^    void Monitor::event_action(const string& callsign, const string& action, const string& reaso/
ctags.signature: (const string & callsign,const string & action,const string & reason)

ctags.name: get_status
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t Monitor::get_status(const string& index, Core::JSON::ArrayType<InfoInfo>& response)/
